div.div: Your session will expire in 0 minutes.

div.h1: COVID-19 IMPORTANT - Information Regarding Education and Meals - March 20th 11:00 a.m.
div.p: Governor Ducey and Superintendent Hoffman announced on Friday afternoon that schools will remain closed through April 10th.

As Spring Break ends on Monday we are making plans to support our students. Mrs. Raymond, Mr. Rodriguez, and many other staff members have been developing plans for learning opportunities and meals starting on Monday, March 23rd.

Mr. Calderon has made preparations for student meals. Please refer to this information - School Meals near MCOB or School Meals near Villa Oasis In addition, other area schools in Pinal County and throughout the state of Arizona will also provide meals to students regardless of which school students attend. For assistance locating meals please contact our school office.
Mr. Rodriguez or a staff member has contacted all students and/or parents of Villa Oasis to inform everyone how will we move forward during the COVID-19 School Closure.
Mrs. Raymond has outlined a plan for MCOB students in a MCOB Parent Letter or Spanish version
We are here to support students and families during this current health crisis, please contact your school with questions or requests for assistance.
